entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning then 60 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Risk of thunderstorms this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High 9. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MST Friday 7 April 2023
